sect1.title: Global Settings
sect1.para:
The following table describes the global settings you can configure:
Global Settings
Name Arguments Description
ServerTokens One of ProductOnly, Major, Minor, Revision, OS, None Define what to print in the initial greeting of the protocol (first message of the server)
ServerSignature string Define the string to be printed in the initial greeting of the protocol (first message of the server)
Example configuration:
ServerTokens OS ServerSignature "Wolframe"
